name: Historical Period
description: Era-specific visual, architecture and material cues (subject-agnostic)

example.prompt: stone and metal artifacts, hand-crafted surface irregularities, limited glazing, weathered patinas, pre-industrial tool forms
example.video-generation-prompt: An open-air stone courtyard displays metal artifacts. Hand-crafted irregularities and weathered patinas define surfaces; pre-industrial tools rest under diffuse light.
